title: Server unavailable?
body: As of right now this is the status. Why does it always have to be OCE?{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body: Thanks for confirming the patch guys, appreciate it.

On 25/02/16, starting at 04:30 Sydney Time (17:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 6.4. At 06:00 Sydney Time (19:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours. - Yeah the next patch is currently rolling out :)
Pretty sure its down for the release of patch 6.4
